remembers.","tagList":[],"createdAt":"2023-07-02T20:21:06.751Z","updatedAt":"2023-07-02T20:21:06.751Z","favorited":false,"favoritesCount":0,"author":{"username":"bacharDev","bio":null,"image":"https://api.realworld.io/images/smiley-cyrus.jpeg","following":false}},{"slug":"Vickon-Botley-196364","title":"Vickon word.","tagList":[],"createdAt":"2023-07-02T20:20:16.891Z","updatedAt":"2023-07-02T20:20:16.891Z","favorited":false,"favoritesCount":0,"author":{"username":"bacharDev","bio":null,"image":"https://api.realworld.io/images/smiley-cyrus.jpeg","following":false}},{"slug":"Lester-196364","title":"Lester","description":"Pentos","body":"There are no heroes...in life, the monsters win.","tagList":[],"createdAt":"2023-07-02T20:18:51.508Z","updatedAt":"2023-07-02T20:18:51.508Z","favorited":false,"favoritesCount":0,"author":{"username":"bacharDev","bio":null,"image":"https://api.realworld.io/images/smiley-cyrus.jpeg","following":false}},{"slug":"Malleon-196364","title":"Malleon","description":"Myr","body":"Things are not always as they seemed, much that may seem evil can be good.","tagList":[],"createdAt":"2023-07-02T20:17:11.916Z","updatedAt":"2023-07-02T20:17:11.916Z","favorited":false,"favoritesCount":0,"author":{"username":"bacharDev","bio":null,"image":"https://api.realworld.io/images/smiley-cyrus.jpeg","following":false}},{"slug":"Perros-Blackmont-196364","title":"Perros die.","tagList":[],"createdAt":"2023-07-02T20:16:21.480Z","updatedAt":"2023-07-02T20:16:21.480Z","favorited":false,"favoritesCount":0,"author":{"username":"bacharDev","bio":null,"image":"https://api.realworld.io/images/smiley-cyrus.jpeg","following":false}},{"slug":"Donel-Greyjoy-196364","title":"Donel Greyjoy","description":"Sar Meel","body":"Power is a curious thing. Who lives, Who dies. Power resides where men believe it resides. It is a trick, A shadow on the wall.","tagList":[],"createdAt":"2023-07-02T20:15:41.758Z","updatedAt":"2023-07-02T20:15:41.758Z","favorited":false,"favoritesCount":0,"author":{"username":"bacharDev","bio":null,"image":"https://api.realworld.io/images/smiley-cyrus.jpeg","following":false}},{"slug":"Lormelle-196364","title":"Lormelle","description":"Braavos","body":"And I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples and bastards and broken things.","tagList":[],"createdAt":"2023-07-02T20:14:09.436Z","updatedAt":"2023-07-02T20:14:09.436Z","favorited":false,"favoritesCount":0,"author":{"username":"bacharDev","bio":null,"image":"https://api.realworld.io/images/smiley-cyrus.jpeg","following":false}},{"slug":"Sailor's-Wife-196364","title":"Sailor's Wife","description":"King's Landing","body":"Why is it that when one man builds a wall, the next man immediately needs to know what's on the other side?","tagList":[],"createdAt":"2023-07-02T20:11:36.410Z","updatedAt":"2023-07-02T20:11:36.410Z","favorited":false,"favoritesCount":0,"author":{"username":"bacharDev","bio":null,"image":"https://api.realworld.io/images/smiley-cyrus.jpeg","following":false}},{"slug":"Patchface-196364","title":"Patchface","description":"Vaes Dothrak","body":"And so he spoke, and so he spoke, that Lord of Castamere, but now the rains weep o'er his hall, with no one there to hear. Yes, now the rains weep o'er his hall, and not a soul to hear.","tagList":[],"createdAt":"2023-07-02T20:08:07.319Z","updatedAt":"2023-07-02T20:08:07.319Z","favorited":false,"favoritesCount":0,"author":{"username":"bacharDev","bio":null,"image":"https://api.realworld.io/images/smiley-cyrus.jpeg","following":false}}],"articlesCount":217}
